decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | As measured at the boundaries of the application site, the noise level shall not exceed Noise Rating NR35 (as depicted on the Noise Rating Curves issued by the International Organisation for Standardisation) at any time.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties. | Only a maximum of 3 employees (and no visitors) shall be on the premises outside the hours of 08.00 and 21.00 hours on any day.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of nearby residents.
description: Change of use from adult language centre (non-residential institution D1) to offices (B1)
